name: CustomMaterial.Custom
desc: An object that defines the custom properties for the material.

items.name: init(value: SIMD4<Float>, texture: CustomMaterial.Texture?)
items.desc: Creates a custom object from a vector and texture.

items.name: var value: SIMD4<Float>
items.desc: A custom vector that the framework sends to the material’s shader functions.

items.name: var texture: CustomMaterial.Texture?
items.desc: A custom UV-mapped image texture that the framework sends to the material’s shader functions.
